column4: my video driver went wild, removed nvidia driver and now background is 3/4 size and all windows get cut off, any ideas?
my video driver went wild, removed nvidia driver and now background is 3/4 size and all windows get cut off, any ideas?
do you currently have a /etc/X11/xorg.conf file? if so, try starting up X without it and see what happens. only move/rename it. i recommend you don't permanently delete it.
roger. don't know if that'll help, but you're welcome to try it. good luck
